**URL:** [population-science.net](https://www.population-science.net/)

**Description:** You will learn applied tools and cutting-edge analytical approaches to use digital footprint data to explore and understand human population trends and patterns.

**Contents:**<br>
1. Overview<br>
2. Introducing Population Science<br>
3. Geodemographics<br>
4. Sequence Analysis<br>
5. Network Analysis<br>
6. Machine Learning<br>
7. Sentiment Analysis<br>
8. Topic Modelling<br>
9. Modelling Time<br>
10. Assessing Interventions<br>
11. Datasets<br>

**Delivery:** as part of the MSc in Geographic Data Science at the University of Liverpool.
